title: Induced current - loop pulled from magnetic field

content.question: A loop of wire is pulled out of a magnetic field directed into the page, as shown in the figure. During the time the loop is leaving the field, the wire carries a current. Which of the following correctly states the direction of the induced current in the wire and provides correct justification?

choices.label: Current is clockwise due to the decrease in the magnetic field.
Current is clockwise due to the decrease in the magnetic flux.
Current is counterclockwise due to the decrease in the magnetic field.
Current is counterclockwise due to the decrease in the magnetic flux.

content.answer: Current is clockwise due to the decrease in the magnetic flux.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
